hero.subtitle: Fullstack Developer nwere ahụmịhe afọ ise n'inyefe ngwa azụmahịa ndị dị nchebe, nke nwere ike ịrị elu na nke arụmọrụ dị elu.

about.title: Banyere M
about.description: Enwere m mmasị n'ide koodu dị ọcha na nke nwere ike ịrị elu na ịmụta ngwa ọhụrụ mgbe niile. Enwere m ike imekọrịta ihe n'ebe dị anya, ahụmịhe Agile na abụ m onye na-amụ ihe mgbe niile - ugbu a ana m akwalite omume nyocha akpaka na nchekwa.

axa.name: AXA Mansard Insurance Plc
achievements: M duuru usoro na mmempe nke Sistemụ Njikwa Lead site na iji .NET, Angular 19, na SQL Server.
M mebere usoro nchekwa, dị ka encryption na decryption maka payload ndị dị mkpa, RBAC.
M mezigharịrị akụrụngwa ochie site na refactoring ajụjụ na endpoints iji belata ụgwọ teknụzụ, wee nweta mmụba arụmọrụ 25%.
M jikọtara sistemụ ọkwa oge n'ezie site na iji SignalR, nke na-eme ka mmelite dị iche iche gafee usoro ahụ.
M sonyere na emume Agile (nhazi sprint, nyocha, kwụsị) ma nyochaa arịrịọ ịdọrọ na Azure DevOps.
M nyere aka na pipeline DevOps, na-emeziwanye arụmọrụ na CI/CD na Azure DevOps.
M kụziiri ndị mmepe obere 2 na nyocha koodu ọgbọ na njem ọrụ.

harmoni.name: Harmoni Technologies
achievements: M gbanwere ihe ndị ahịa chọrọ na nkwupụta nsogbu azụmahịa ka ọ bụrụ Web API nwere ike ịrị elu site na iji .NET Core.
M manyere omume kachasị mma site na nyocha koodu na njikwa ụdị Git.
M rụpụtara .NET Core Microservices nwere ike ịrị elu.

bytes.name: Bytes Intel Limited
achievements: M dụrụ ndị ahịa ọdụ ọdụ iji kpụọ ihe azụmahịa na ngwaahịa chọrọ.
M wuru ma tinye sistemụ eCommerce site na iji .NET Framework, Web API na SQL Server.
M mepụtara ma nye nlekọta maka webụsaịtị .NET ruru anọ (4).

mymonie.title: MyMonie
mymonie.description: Ngwanrọ nhazi ego na nyocha. M wuru isi nhazi ego na mmefu ego na .NET 8 na Angular. Ugbu a m na-enyocha njikọ GPT API maka atụmatụ mmefu ego nwere ọgụgụ isi.

contact.title: Ka anyị kparịta ụka
contact.subtitle: Ka anyị rụkọọ ọrụ iji mee ka echiche gị dị ndụ
contact.connect_description: M na-enwe mmasị mgbe niile ịnụ banyere ohere ọhụrụ na ọrụ na-atọ ụtọ. Ma ị nwere ajụjụ ma ọ bụ naanị chọrọ ikwu ndewo, m ga-agbalị ike m niile ịlaghachi gị!
contact.name: Aha
contact.subject: Isiokwu
contact.message_placeholder: Gwa m banyere ọrụ gị ma ọ bụ kwuo ndewo!
contact.success_message: Daalụ! Ezipụla ozi gị nke ọma.
